nodes.title: II.1. Stelae and accompanying structures: Funerary and non-funerary structures
Drangchung Babum DoringGrang chung ba bam rdo ring
General site characteristics
nodes.body: Drangchung Babum DoringGrang chung ba bam rdo ring, a line of five small pillars, is situated on a broad, moderately inclined, turf-studded sandy slope. The site overlooks the south side of the MenchuSman chu valley and is in a locale known as DubakDus bag (sp.?). The five irregularly shaped and tabular standing stones form a row 1.5 m in length. Originally dark gray in color, hese stones have weathered to reddish brown. If there were other structures accompanying the pillars of Drangchung Babum DoringGrang chung ba bam rdo ring hey have been totally engulfed by the sands.

nodes.title: Oral tradition
nodes.body: According to local sources, Drangchung Babum DoringGrang chung ba bam rdo ring is an ancient monument.
